## Checklist (Definition of Done)

- [ ] Scope is limited and modular
- [ ] Multi-tenant safety considered (`org_id` + auth boundaries)
- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing locally
- [ ] `make check` passes
- [ ] `make test` passes
- [ ] Security impact reviewed (PII/logging/secrets)
- [ ] Docs updated (`README.md`/`docs/*`) if behavior changed
- [ ] Rollback or mitigation strategy documented

## Evidence

- [ ] Commands run and summarized
- [ ] Screenshots/logs attached where useful
